name: Traveller X Arrival
description:
Play as Starr, a pilot who must travel towards planets surrounded by enemies.

Next update: 

8 more bosses, leaving version two at 10 bosses

Eventual worlds --> Water world, Earth world, Australia, China, France, each with their own sets of 10 bosses or so. 

Long term goals

1 vs. 1 fights online multiplayer

2 player online co-op mission campaign

store (using points to upgrade fire rate, laser weapons, upgrading boost speed)

Alternate attacks from bosses and waves (Tetris-block shaped obstacles)

Testing on consoles (Mobile, PS4, PS5, Switch, Xbox One)
